channel.title: Debian on Nodjoy
channel.description: Recent content in Debian on Nodjoy

item.title: Proxmox升级openssh版本
item.description: openssh版本升级至9.6p1 环境 OS: Proxmox7.4 (Debian11) 设置apt源 sed -i 's@deb.debian.org@mirrors.huaweicloud.com@g' /etc/apt/sources.list sed -i 's@ftp.debian.org@mirrors.huaweicloud.com@g' /etc/apt/sources.list apt update 取消proxmox对软件卸载的限制(暂时移除pve-apt-ho
